item.description:
LATKE AND HAMENTASCHEN DEBATE

TC: Anne trips@mosaicmass.org or (day of event) 617-571-7081

EVENT: Join this annual tradition, sponsored by MIT Hillel, in which the best and brightest of MIT professors earnestly debate the superiority of the latke and the hamentaschen. Decide for yourself, sampling both after the debate. This event is a hoot and is always standing room only! RSVP so we can save seats and sit together. See the MIT web site for more information: http://www.mit.edu/~h...
MEET: 7:30 p.m. in MIT Room 26-100. If you are not familiar with the MIT campus, check here for a map: http://whereis.mit.ed...
RSVP: Recommended by March 3. Otherwise, you?re on your own!
COST: Event is free + $5 for non-members.
item.why: It is a chance to enjoy a great debate which is an annual traditon.

group.name: Mosaic Jewish Outdoor Club of Massachusetts

item.name: LATKE AND HAMENTASCHEN DEBATE
